Description: The identifier of a read group. Must be unique within each sample. After submission, the submitter_read_group_id in the metadata will be used for all future @RG ID in the header.
Permissible Values: String values that meet the regular expression ^[a-zA-Z0-9\\-_:\\.']+$.
String values must meet the regular expression ^[A-Za-z0-9_\\.\\-\\[\\]\\(\\)]+$. No paths are allowed in the file name.

Description: Size of the file, in bytes.

Permissible Values: String values must meet the regular expression ^[a-fA-F0-9]{32}$

Description: The path to the file to be submitted
Note: Required for local data and data downloaded from EGA through Aspera
Required for data downloaded from EGA
